meaning_str.bing:
n. 庆祝；庆典；庆祝活动；颂扬
网络. 庆祝会；典礼；欢庆

庆祝；庆典；庆祝活动；颂扬

庆典；庆祝活动；典礼；仪式；庆祝；颂扬

1.en: "It was a night of celebration and pre-season atmosphere at the San Paolo stadium of Naples, " he said.
1.cn: “这是一个庆祝之夜，同时在那布勒斯的圣保罗球场充满了季前热身赛的气氛。”他说。

2.en: The celebration of this cycle of death and renewal was one of the major festivals of the metroac cult.
2.cn: 庆祝死亡与复活的循环是metroac仪式的其中一个主要节日。

3.en: I suppose we shall be having some sort of celebration for the bride.
3.cn: 我想我们还是来为新娘庆贺一番吧。

0.en: I just want to remind you that today is a day of celebration.
0.cn: 我想提醒各位，今天是值得庆祝的一天。

1.en: Learn which of the 12 zodiac animals is associated with that year's celebration.
1.cn: 知道新年即将庆祝哪一个生肖。

2.en: I suppose we could try to make it a celebration, but he died so young.
2.cn: 我们是可以当成喜事庆祝一番，可惜他英年早逝。

3.en: They will come in celebration. And then, we will know their size and strength.
3.cn: 他们会来庆祝，我们就能摸清他们的实力。

4.en: Don't do this. It's too late. I have a celebration to plan and a new story to tell. Robert.
4.cn: 别这样。太晚了，我还要准备庆祝，还要叙述新的故事。罗伯特。

5.en: Okay, well, everybody has ordered. I would like to start the celebration and make a toast to Phoebe.
5.cn: 好了，嗯，既然大家都已经点餐了，我想要先敬菲比一杯 来开始今晚的庆祝。

6.en: Only a few blocks away you'll find the Powerhouse Museum, a celebration of steam, space, and science.
6.cn: 走过几条街便是发电厂博物馆，是为了庆祝纪念蒸汽引擎，航天技术和科学而建的。

7.en: Are you saying that you think a "celebration pie" is even remotely comparable to a Nobel Prize? Well, they're pretty tasty.
7.cn: 你是说你认为“庆祝馅饼”能跟诺贝尔奖相提并论吗？那馅饼很好吃呢。

8.en: Step 4: Buy new, red clothes to wear throughout the Chinese New Year celebration. The color is considered lucky.
8.cn: 第四步：买一些中国新年要穿来庆祝节日的红色新衣服，红色被认为是幸运的颜色。

9.en: Pardon me for interrupting your premature celebration, but I thought it only fair to give you a sporting chance as you are new to this game.
9.cn: 原谅我打断了你的庆祝会，但我觉得应该给你一个机会才公平，毕竟你才加入这场游戏。

10.en: And I'm not going to tell you what song I'm gonna play either. But, let's just say when it's over I'll bet there will be a we bit o' celebration.
10.cn: 我也不会告诉你们，我要吹哪首曲子，只是说当表演结束后，我们一定会“庆祝”一下。

11.en: And at Chinese New Year, the modern and the traditional are brought together, as the Chinese prepare for a celebration even older than the Great Wall itself.
11.cn: 在春节期间，现代与传统会交融到一起，中国人庆祝春节的历史甚至比长城更古老。

12.en: Well, no, but when I was a senior in high school, one of my friends heard I was going to be named head cheerleader. Oh, I was so excited. My mom even made me a celebration pie.
12.cn: 没有，不过我高三的时候我的一个朋友听说我会被选为啦啦队的队长。哦，我那个高兴啊。我妈甚至给我烤了一个庆祝馅饼。

13.en: Given that Saint Valentine was a third century Roman priest who was stoned and beheaded, wouldn't a more appropriate celebration of the evening be taking one's steady gal to witness a brutal murder?
13.cn: 考虑到圣瓦伦丁是个在公元三世纪被丢石头和斩首的罗马祭司，在这个夜晚带着女朋友去看一场残忍的凶杀难道不是更合情理的庆祝方式吗？

14.en: Here in Hong Kong, they take celebration to a whole other level.
14.cn: 在香港，人们将庆典提升到了新的境界。

15.en: Welcome to Bird Island! Welcome to our new friends, the pigs. Let us have a celebration!
15.cn: 欢迎你们来到小鸟岛，欢迎我们的新朋友猪猪们，今晚我们要举行庆典！

16.en: I want every camera watching. We will turn their advance into a celebration of suffering.
16.cn: 我要每一个摄像机都开着，我们将把他们的前进变成痛苦的狂欢。

17.en: And thank you to the class of 2014 for inviting me to be part of your celebration. It means a great deal to me.
17.cn: 还要感谢2014届毕业生，邀请我来到这次盛典，这对我价值巨大。

18.en: No other city impresses Chinese New Year celebration with such energy, enthusiasm and sheer expenditure as Hong Kong.
18.cn: 再没其它城市会如香港这般以如此的精力，热情和大把金钱，将春节庆典深印人心。

19.en: You hear that? That is her truth, Mr. "I'll Let You Have Her". I win. You suck. I rule all. Mini-wave in celebration of me.
19.cn: 听到没有？这是她的真心话，说什么“我把她让给你”！我赢了，你输了，我是决策者，给我来个迷你波浪舞。
